item.description:
Let's have a a playdate! Hopefully the weather will be nice so the little ones can enjoy playing at the playground right behind our west Cambridge home... So come on over. If the weather is not as nice, we'll play indoors. We'll provide snacks and drinks.

Please RSVP by Thursday, June 25 so we can plan accordingly. The exact location will only be given to members who respond "Yes."

We look forward to meeting all of you and discussing possible future events!

"Kimbap"
item.name: Playdate!
